title: The day I learned what my passion was
summary: I was sitting in my room and in my Jain class. The teachers were talking about a project they wanted to start to help Jains, Vegetarians, and Vegans in finding food that they can eat in stores.
contentHtml:
I was sitting in my room and in my Jain class. The teachers were talking about a project they wanted to start to help Jains, Vegetarians, and Vegans in finding food that they can eat in stores. We originally were planning on making a big spreadsheet with details of foods that were safe to eat for Jains, Vegetarians, and Vegans. I wondered if it would be much better and easier to access for people if we made it an app.

This idea led me to make the first version for the web at https://v1.stepstokindness.org â€” an original version where I added a few items and showed what potential this idea had.

I had it reviewed by my teachers who shared it with their supervisors, and they told me I should make a more functional version and develop the app. This is where I started my passion project.
